description: Numerous ponds and small lake surrounded by scrubby vegetation. Crushed rock and larger rocks. Where am I? This is not your typical New Brunswick MTB trail. Its like your in the southwest. Look for the deer skull. Its lots of fun. Part of the MTBM network created by Doctor M
directions: Old railbed west of Northfield Ave or take the Geiger Counter connection route.
title: The 8200
